verification.payload:
tree 90ac4684d9d4e5a1269fe96494294dfd3dfd7e8e
parent 9da3de80aea23a1c3623f737404dcdabf5f78c0c
author Jeff Garzik <jgarzik@bitpay.com> 1442504695 -0400
committer Jeff Garzik <jgarzik@bitpay.com> 1442504695 -0400

Temporarily disable ZMQ tests in bitcoin test suite

files.patch:
@@ -59,9 +59,9 @@ testScriptsExt=(
     'p2p-acceptblock.py'
 );
 
-if [ "x$ENABLE_ZMQ" = "x1" ]; then
-  testScripts+=('zmq_test.py')
-fi
+#if [ "x$ENABLE_ZMQ" = "x1" ]; then
+#  testScripts+=('zmq_test.py')
+#fi
 
 extArg="-extended"
 passOn=${@#$extArg}
